snippet: COHEN--Harry, passed away at the age of 95. Beloved husband of Rhoda. Dear father of Adam (Alicia). He lived a long, happy life and loved people. He brought smiles to many. Service 11:15 today at "The Riverside," 76 Street and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: COHEN--Harry, passed away at the age of 95. Beloved husband of Rhoda. Dear father of Adam (Alicia). He lived a long, happy life and loved people. He brought smiles to many. Service 11:15 today at "The Riverside," 76 Street and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3
